lead_paragraph: Drew Brees was patient and non-confrontational while fielding repeated questions about why he and the New Orleans Saints weren't able to negotiate a contract extension before Thursday's opening training camp practice.

headline.print_headline: Brees Downplays Contract Uncertainty, Touts His Longevity
headline.main: Brees Downplays Contract Uncertainty, Touts His Longevity

snippet: Drew Brees was patient and non-confrontational while fielding repeated questions about why he and the New Orleans Saints weren't able to negotiate a contract extension before Thursday's opening training camp practice....
